com.jde.audio

Class Audible

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.audio.Audible
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Music, SoundEffect

    public abstract class Audible
extends java.lang.Object
    This Audible class stores a playable sound
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
